summary: Defines a suite of data classes that model and manage configuration details for the different types of test hosts used by the ansible-test framework. The classes encapsulate defaults, serialization, status checks (e.g., root access, managed mode), fallback handling, inventory settings, and completion information for controller, Docker, POSIX, Windows, network, and Python environments.
